attributes.action: actively support Thabitha Khumalo & Action for Southern Africa Sanitary Appeal & to find ways of helping Zimbabwean women achieve access to affordable sanitary products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently women in Zimbabwe do not have access to sanitary products, due to the high costs compared to household incomes.  This affects health and dignity.  All women in the UK should be appalled that the dignity and health of many women in Zimbabwe is seriously compromised by this lack of access to sanitary products at anything other than prohibitive prices and should support Thabitha Khumalo, Women's Secretary of the Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions.
